程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

类 RootSwitch

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.RootSwitch
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class RootSwitch
extends Switch
This class allows to simulate Root switch which connects Datacenters to external network. It interacts with other switches in order to exchange packets.
Please refer to following publication for more details:
  • Saurabh Kumar Garg and Rajkumar Buyya, NetworkCloudSim: Modelling Parallel Applications in Cloud Simulations, Proceedings of the 4th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Utility and Cloud Computing (UCC 2011, IEEE CS Press, USA), Melbourne, Australia, December 5-7, 2011.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0

  • 构造器详细资料

    • RootSwitch

      public RootSwitch​(java.lang.String name, int level, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a Root Switch specifying what other switches are connected to its downlink ports, and corresponding bandwidths.
      参数:
      name - Name of the root switch
      level - At which level the switch is with respect to hosts.
      dc - The Datacenter where the switch is connected to

  • 方法详细资料

    • processpacket_up

      protected void processpacket_up​(SimEvent ev)
      从类复制的说明: Switch
      Sends a packet to switches connected through a uplink port.
      覆盖:
      processpacket_up 在类中 Switch
      参数:
      ev - Event/packet to process
